titles.title: Calling for an independent international investigation of the April 10, 2010, plane crash in Russia that killed Poland's president Lech Kaczynski and 95 other individuals.
Calling for an independent international investigation of the April 10, 2010, plane crash in Russia that killed Poland's president Lech Kaczynski and 95 other individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Calls for an independent international investigation of the April 10, 2010, plane crash that killed Poland's president Lech Kaczynski and 95 other individuals.
